schemas.name: ocsf_event_envelope.schema.json
schemas.purpose: Minimal required OCSF + provenance for normalized events.

schemas.name: mapping_coverage.schema.json
schemas.purpose: Optional mapping coverage stats for normalized/mapping_coverage.json.

schemas.name: bridge_compiled_plan.schema.json
schemas.purpose: Sigma-to-OCSF bridge compiled plan per rule (bridge/compiled_plans/<rule_id>.plan.json).

schemas.name: pcap_manifest.schema.json
schemas.purpose: Manifest enumerating pcap capture files for a run (placeholder contract; v0.1).

schemas.name: netflow_manifest.schema.json
schemas.purpose: Manifest enumerating netflow capture/log files for a run (placeholder contract; v0.1).

notes: Most schemas are strict (additionalProperties=false) and provide an 'extensions' object for forward-compatible additions.
OCSF envelope is permissive (additionalProperties=true) to allow full OCSF payloads and vendor extensions while requiring provenance.
